config.skycubed.general.keybinds.desc: SkyCubed uses the vanilla keybinds/controls menu for its buttons, you can use the button to open it here.
config.skycubed.general.notifications.de: SkyCubed has a notification system, you can click the button below to view past notifications, you can also find a notification button in the pause menu.
config.skycubed.general.hiddenHudElement: Allows you to hide certain elements of the Vanilla hud on your screen.
config.skycubed.general.hiddenActionBarW: Allows you to hide certain action bar elements that hypixel send but are replaced by mod displays.
config.skycubed.overlays.title: Overlays
config.skycubed.overlays.info.desc: Settings for the info hud overlay.
config.skycubed.overlays.info.enabled.de: Enables the Info Hud overlay, show location, currency, time, and location specific info.
config.skycubed.overlays.rpg.enabled.des: Enables the RPG overlay, showing mana, health, and xp bars.
config.skycubed.overlays.rpg.skyblockLev: If enabled the XP bar will show your SkyBlock level instead of your normal XP.
config.skycubed.overlays.text.desc: Settings for the the various text overlays.
config.skycubed.overlays.sacks.enabled.d:
Enables the sack overlay, showing specified items in your sack.
You can edit these items with /skycubed sackhud.
config.skycubed.overlays.sacks.backgroun: Use the SkyCubed background texture instead of a color.
config.skycubed.overlays.tablist.desc: Settings for the custom tab list overlay.
config.skycubed.overlays.tablist.enabled: Enables the custom tab list, this tab list is a compact customizable version of the vanilla one for skyblock.
config.skycubed.overlays.tablist.sorting: The way the players should be sorted in the tab list.
config.skycubed.overlays.map.enabled.des: Enables the minimap overlay, showing where you are on SkyBlock.
config.skycubed.overlays.dungeonmap.desc: Settings for the minimap overlay for dungeons.
config.skycubed.overlays.dungeonmap.enab: Enables the dungeon map overlay, showing where you are in dungeons.
config.skycubed.overlays.dungeonmap.room: The colors of the rooms in dungeons.
config.skycubed.overlays.dungeonmap.door: The colors of the doors in dungeons.
config.skycubed.overlays.pickuplog.desc: Settings the Item Pickup Log overlay.
config.skycubed.overlays.pickuplog.enabl: Enables the pickup log overlay, showing which items that have been added or removed from your inventory.
config.skycubed.overlays.pickuplog.compa: With this enabled it will compact them into the differences ie. if you had 3 of an item added and then 1 of the item removed itd only show as +2.
How long an individual entry should be shown for after it has happened, this is in seconds.
config.skycubed.overlays.pickuplog.sackI: If enabled the items in your sack will also be shown in the pickup log.
config.skycubed.overlays.pickuplog.appea: The order of how a display should be shown on screen. ie. if you want the items after the text or before.
config.skycubed.overlays.commissions.des: Settings for the mining commissions overlay.
config.skycubed.overlays.commissions.ena: Enables the commissions overlay, showing which commissions you have on mining islands.
config.skycubed.overlays.commissions.for: If enabled the commissions will display as a number out of another number or a check mark instead of just a percentage.
config.skycubed.overlays.commissions.bac: If enabled the overlay will have a textured background instead of a transparent black background.
config.skycubed.overlays.npc.enabled.des: If enabled the NPC messages will no longer go to chat but will instead go to an overlay.
config.skycubed.overlays.npc.durationPer: The time in seconds of how long a message should be displayed for.
config.skycubed.overlays.npc.durationFor: The time in seconds of how long an action message should be displayed for. ie. a message that you have to choose an option from.
config.skycubed.overlays.npc.hideChatMes: If enabled the chat messages will be hidden when an NPC message is displayed.
config.skycubed.overlays.coldOverlay.des:
The temperature at which the cold overlay starts appearing.
ยงlNote: setting this to 0 will disable the cold overlay
config.skycubed.overlays.movableHotbar.d: Allows you to move the hotbar around the screen.
config.skycubed.overlays.windOverlay.des: Displays the wind indicator from the gone with the Wind event on your cursor.
config.skycubed.chat.title: Chat
config.skycubed.chat.chatColors.desc: Changes the color of the line next to a chat message to a color based on the message type
config.skycubed.chat.compactChat.desc: Makes the chat more compact by removing old messages of similar type. ie. cooldowns or lists or other spammy messages but important messages
config.skycubed.chat.messagesToClean.des: A list of message you would like to be removed from chat, these are written as regex patterns
config.skycubed.screens.title: Screens
config.skycubed.screens.equipment.desc: Shows your equipment in your inventory next to your player like armor.
config.skycubed.screens.wardrobe.desc: Changes the wardrobe to be a custom wardrobe with more options.
config.skycubed.screens.wardrobe.texture: Changes it from transparent squares to actual textures.
config.skycubed.items.title: Items
config.skycubed.items.itembars.desc: Adds a bar to various items such as drills with their current count.
config.skycubed.items.cooldowns.desc: Adds vanilla cooldowns to SkyBlock items.
config.skycubed.render.title: Rendering
config.skycubed.render.showOwnTag.desc: Renders your own name tag in third person.
config.skycubed.notification.hideChatMes: If enabled the chat messages will be hidden when a notification is displayed.
config.skycubed.notification.showAsToast: If enabled the notifications will show as a toast message.
config.skycubed.notification.toastDurati: The time in seconds of how long a toast notification should be displayed for.
